history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or walking directions
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go?
USER Pittsburgh pains are Regina
TTS Okay, going to dr. regina i. jakacki, md. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER No going to Pittsburgh Paints Arena.
TTS Okay, going to ppg paints arena. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER CMU
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 12:07 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 19 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Start at Location 1. Go west on FORBES AVENUE toward SOUTH CRAIG STREET, and then cross the street on <break strength='strong'/>SOUTH CRAIG STREETREET </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right on SOUTH CRAIG STREET </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right on FORBES AVENUE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Finish at Forbes Ave at Craig Streeton the right </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER next
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue at Craig Street </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 61D <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 5th avenue + Washington Place</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 12:14pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Start at Location 1. Go east on 5TH AVENUE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Make sharp left </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER proceed
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
